item.description:
This is an intermediate dayhike over Mt. Cannon and the Kinsmans. According to the AMC guide this is about 13.3 miles with a 10 hour book time. I'm looking for a 2mph pace though so I expect it to take less than 8 hours. We'll start at Lafayette Campground at 8am. I'll be driving up 93 that morning so I can carpool with one other person or two if someone doesn't mind sitting in the backseat with a dog.

 

Trails:

Lonesome Lake Tr. ->

Kinsman Ridge Tr. ->

Mt. Cannon ->

South Kinsman ->

Fishin Jimmy Tr. ->

Lonesome Lake Tr and back to the parking lot
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a guy with a yellow Lab wearing a blue dog pack.
item.name: Cannon and Kinsmans Intermediate hike
